problem_text:
Let F be a hereditary saturated formation and let w∗F denote the class of all finite groups G for which π(G) ⊆ π(F) and the normalizers of all Sylow subgroups of G are F-subnormal in G.
It is known that w∗F is a formation.
Must w∗F be
a saturated formation?
A. F. Vasil’ev, T. I. Vasil’eva
